PackageOracle.name: DA_WORK_ORDER_RESCHEDULE_RSN
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_WORK_ORDER_RESCHEDULE_RSN
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.26.385060000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,work_order_reschedule_rsn_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,reason_desc IN VARCHAR2
,reason_long_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,work_order_reschedule_rsn_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_work_order_reschedule_rsn;

body.name: DA_WORK_ORDER_RESCHEDULE_RSN
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_WORK_ORDER_RESCHEDULE_RSN
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.26.394875000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,work_order_reschedule_rsn_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,reason_desc IN VARCHAR2
,reason_long_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_work_order_reschedule_rsn.add, parms=' || work_order_reschedule_rsn_cd || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || reason_desc || '|' || reason_long_desc || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_work_order_reschedule_rsn a
(
a.work_order_reschedule_rsn_cd
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.reason_desc
,a.reason_long_desc
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.work_order_reschedule_rsn_cd
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.reason_desc
,add.reason_long_desc
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_work_order_reschedule_rsn.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,work_order_reschedule_rsn_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_work_order_reschedule_rsn.del, parms=' || work_order_reschedule_rsn_cd || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_work_order_reschedule_rsn a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.work_order_reschedule_rsn_cd = del.work_order_reschedule_rsn_cd
AND a.data_source_type_cd = del.data_source_type_cd
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_work_order_reschedule_rsn.del');

END del;

END da_work_order_reschedule_rsn;
